message: Well hey there. Did you just drop from the stars? 'cause your eyes are so sparkling tonight.
author: Story Corner

message: Your kikkerikey has unlocked my heart. Maybe you'd like to come in for some hot chocolate.
author: Anonymous Sticky Note Service NO. 1

message:
Yo yo, Girl you're so hot. 
 You remind me of what I'm not. 
 I like you, you're pretty spicy. 
 I just hope you're not pricey. 
 I believe this must be fate, 
 Let's go on with a date.

message: Are you a Pokemon player? Cuz I want you to see you rising from Ash

message:

 Damn girl! Should I call the firefighters? Cause you are ON FIRE!

message: Are you made of radium? 'Cause the energy you radiate is jaw-dropping.

message: Are you a phoenix, cause damn you're blazing hot!!

message: If I was a cat and had nine lives, I'll spend every single one of them watching, loving and supporting you.
